original: aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: aushn sha bi dza ya sa dha nam

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam ba rgyal ma sgrub thabs

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam ba rgyal ma la phyag tshal lo

original: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas zla ba la bhr'um dkar po yongs su gyur pa las zhal gsum spyan gsum ma /
analyzed: sngon du ston ba cho gas zla ba la bhrum dkar po yongs su gyur ba las zhal gsum spyan gsum ma

original: lang tsho gsar la bab pa /
analyzed: lang tsho gsar la bab ba

original: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bza' dang ldan pa /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bza dang ldan ba

original: phyag brgyad pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag brgyad ba gtsug tor rnam ba rgyal ma bsam ba byed

original: ser po dang nag po ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
analyzed: ser po dang nag po ni g-yas ba dang cig shos kyi zhal lo

original: g-yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang / padma la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mda' dang / mchog sbyin ma'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang padma la gnas ba sangs rgya kyi sku dang mda dang mchog sbyin ma

original: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su gzhu dang / sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhabs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang / bum pa gang ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su gzhu dang sdigs mdzub dang cha ba zhabs ba dang mi jigs ba phyag rgya dang bum ba gang ba

original: mchod rten gyi phug gi khong na gnas par bskyed la /
analyzed: mchod rten gyi bugs gi khong na gnas ba skyed la

original: padma la gnas pa'i sa bon snying gar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: padma la gnas ba sa bon snying gar bsam ba byed

original: de'i rjes su spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / lte ba dang / rkang pa rnams su go rims bzhin du h'um tr'am hr'i:aam aa:zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de rjes su spyi bo dang dpral ba dang mgrin ba dang lte ba dang rkang ba rnams su go rims bzhin du hum tr hr:aam aa:zhes byed ba yi ge rnam ba bsam ba byed

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam ba rgyal ma sgrub ba thabs rdzogs so

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus so//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang khams ba lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris sgyur cing zhus
